cards.title: Pistol Whip
cards.text: Shootout: Boot your dude in this posse to send a dude in the other posse home booted. Your dude gets –1 bullets (minimum 0).
cards.flavor: “Sloane wanted me to send you this message personally.” —Alice Stowe

cards.title: Pony Express
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Discard a card to draw a card.
cards.flavor: Neither snow nor rain nor heat nor gloom of night... but arrows are another story.

cards.title: The Stakes Just Rose
cards.text: Shootout: Move one of your dudes into your posse. That dude becomes a stud.
cards.flavor: Come out, come out wherever you are!

cards.title: Circle M Ranch
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: If you have 3 or fewer cards in your play hand, draw a card.
cards.flavor: “As you can see, Mr. Crowley, Morgan will do whatever it takes to reach the top, and we’re always willing to help a friend do the same.” —Lillian Morgan

cards.title: One Good Turn…
cards.text: Noon: Draw a card. Cheatin’ Resolution: Gain 3 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: “I sure do owe ya one, Mr. Grothe... too bad ya don’t drink.” —Clementine Lepp

cards.title: Carter's Bounties
cards.text: Controller Shootout, Boot: Move your dude into your posse from any location.
cards.flavor: “The price is good, but that’s a bounty even I wouldn’t pursue.”

cards.title: Steven Wiles
cards.flavor: “I found him there, like it’d just been any other night, and offered him a job on the spot. It was a shame he declined. Any man who can stand up to a Hangin’ Judge was born to be a Ranger.” —Katie Karl

cards.title: Unprepared
cards.text: Shootout: Choose a dude. Boot that dude and their attached cards. That dude gets –1 bullets and cannot use their abilities. Their attached cards lose all traits, abilities, and bullet bonuses.
cards.flavor: “Tarnation, woman! Nothin’ worse than bein’ late for a killin’!”

cards.title: B & B Attorneys
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the bounty on a wanted dude by one (if the bounty goes to zero, the dude is no longer wanted).
cards.flavor: “The best defense is a pouch full of ghost rock.” —Makaio Kaleo, Esq.

cards.title: It's Not What You Know...
cards.text: Resolution: Lower a player's draw hand by 1 rank. Cheatin' Resolution: Lower a player's draw hand by 4 ranks.
cards.flavor: "Play the man, not the cards." -Steele Archer

cards.title: Yan Li's Tailoring
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise a dude's influence by 1.
cards.flavor: "I don't understand why people so upset. Whateley can't do much. Mayors, like gangs, bosses, and dreams... they come and go. Whoever owns this town, one thing for certain: They're going to want a nice shirt." -Yan Li

cards.title: Rumors
cards.text: Noon: Choose a dude. That dude gets –1 influence while at any location except home.
cards.flavor: "Well, I never!"

cards.title: Mustang
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Move this dude (without booting).
cards.flavor: "If you're ever lost, trust a mustang. He knows the way back." -Jon Longstride

cards.title: Teleportation Device
cards.text: After this gadget is invented, attach it to a deed that you control. Repeat Controller Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Choose your dude at this location and pull. If the pull is a club, discard the dude. Otherwise, move your dude to another location (without booting).

cards.title: Soul Blast
cards.text: Shootout Hex X, Boot: Choose a dude in this shootout. X is that dude's grit. If successful, send the dude home booted. If successful by 6 or more, ace the dude instead. If unsuccessful, move this Huckster home booted.

cards.title: Coachwhip!
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution: The cheatin' player must boot one of their dudes. If in a shootout, that dude gets aced instead. If you have a legal hand, you choose the dude to boot or ace.
cards.flavor: "Beware of snakes in the grass." -Avie Cline

cards.title: Blake Ranch
cards.flavor: "I've been on drives since I was knee-high to a mustang. And lemme tell ya, ma'am, them cows ain't right." -Jarret Blake

cards.title: Kidnappin'
cards.text: Noon Job, Boot: Mark a dude. Your posse must have more total bullets than the marked dude. Raise the bounty of each dude in your posse by 1. If successful, discard the mark.
cards.flavor: "Let's go for a ride." -Sanford Taylor

cards.title: Charlie's Place
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Raise or lower the bullets of a dude at this location by 2.
cards.flavor: "There's nothing in this town or its people so twisted or secret, that it can't be endured... if you have a good drink and someone to share it with." -Max Baine

cards.title: A Fight They'll Never Forget
cards.text: Shootout: Each dude in your posse gets +1 bullets. After each time any dude is aced as a casualty, the shooter in the other posse permanently gets 1 control point. Ace this card.
cards.flavor: R.I.P. -David Oville Montreal

cards.title: Baird's Build and Loan
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Play a deed (as shoppin'), reducing its cost by 2 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "A sizeable contribution indeed! The Master will be pleased, Lane. No need to look so dour." -Mr. Baird

cards.title: Jake Smiley
cards.text: Jake has +2 influence during the Sundown phase.
cards.flavor: "Ugh... he is by far the biggest waste of a rose ever. The only one of my clowns who has proven to be more useless after I claimed him!" —Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Arnold Stewart
cards.text: Noon: Boot a Gadget on Arnold to discard the top five cards of your deck. If one of those cards was an Out of Town deed, you may boot Arnold to place the deed into your hand.
cards.flavor: "I've made it this far by doing the right thing....I'm gonna keep doing the right thing."

cards.title: Clementine Lepp
cards.text: While in a Saloon you own, Clementine gets +1 influence and cannot be called out.
cards.flavor: "I eventually gave up on Clementine..." - Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Scoop Hound
cards.text: Shootout, Boot: Shootout plays cannot bring dudes into either posse or send dudes home booted (they remain in the posse without booting).

cards.title: Dave "Slim" Gorman
cards.text: React: After Dave casts a Shootout Hex you may discard the Hex to have all dudes in the shootout become draws for this round.
cards.flavor: "He clawed his way up from nuthin'. And if he has his way, that's what we'll all become." -Clementine Lepp

cards.title: Undertaker
cards.text: This deed's controller gains 2 ghost rock each time an in-play dude is aced.
cards.flavor: "Leave me alone and let me go to hell by my own route." - Calamity Jane

cards.title: Paralysis Mark
cards.text: Noon Hex X, Boot: X is the value of a dude at this location. Boot the dude.
cards.flavor: "I told ya you'd regret tryin' to lay a finger on me." -Jonah Essex

cards.title: Rico Rodegain
cards.text: React, Boot: At the start of the game, look at your opponent's hand. Place your non-Grifter dudes on top of your deck and return their cost to your stash. Search your deck for up to the same number of dudes to add to your starting gang, following the standard setup rules.

cards.title: Ivor Hawley
cards.text: If your outfit is , Ivor's cost is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0) for each Abomination in play and in any Boot Hill. React: After Ivor enters play from your hand, play up to two Hexes or Abominations from your Boot Hill. Reduce those cards' cost by 3 each.
cards.flavor: "Pestilence sends its regards"

cards.title: Auto-Revolver
cards.text: You may equip this Gadget as a Shootout play (pay all costs). While this Auto-Revolver is in a shootout and you are forming a draw hand, when you redraw after discarding at least one card, you may draw one extra card.

cards.title: Darius Hellstromme
cards.text: If you are the leader, your shooter has -2 bullets if they do not have a Gadget Weapon attached. React, Boot: After an opposing dude is discarded or aced during a shootout, boot a Gadget Weapon in your posse to give your dude with a Gadget Weapon a permanent control point. If the opposing dude was discarded, they are aced instead.

cards.title: Ezekiah Grimme
cards.text: When attaching a spell to a card, increase the spell's ghost rock cost by the number of copies of that spell in play. React, Boot: After your dude successfully casts a spell attached to them, if the pull was a spell, you may attach it to that dude, booted (paying all costs). Noon, Boot: Boot your skilled dude to reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. If you revealed a spell you have less than 2 copies of in play, you may attach it to that dude (paying all costs). Shuffle the remaining revealed cards into your deck.

cards.title: Jasper Stone
cards.text: Except at home, only your shooter contributes to your draw hand bonuses. React, Boot: After posses are formed, choose a dude in the opposing posse. Your shooter has +2 bullets while opposing that dude, and while your posse has a non-token dude. If that opposing dude is aced, give your declared shooter a permanent control point and permanent +1 bullets.

cards.title: Raven
cards.text: If you are the leader, your posse has a -2 stud pentalty if it has less bullets than the opposing posse. You have an extra control point during Sundown if you control equal or more in-town deeds that you do not own compared to each other player. Noon, Boot: Choose an in-town deed. Your shooter has +2 bullets during shootouts there. The next time you win a shootout there, or if you control it during Sundown and do not own it, give your dude there a permanent +1 bullets if they do not already have a permanent bullet bonus.

cards.title: A Slight Modification
cards.text: React: After an opponent declares the use of a Shootout or non-Cheatin’ Resolution ability, boot a Gadget on a dude in your posse. Waive all costs of the ability, and that ability has no effect.

cards.title: Point Blank
cards.text: Resolution: Boot your stud dude in this posse. Your opponent must ace a dude in their posse with lower bullets than your dude's bullets.

cards.title: Henry Moran
cards.text: If Henry is unbooted when you would reveal an illegal draw hand during lowball, boot Henry, discard the illegal hand, and reveal the top five cards of your deck as your hand instead.

cards.title: Inner Struggle
cards.text: While this card is booted, reduce your shootout hand rank by 1. If you reveal an illegal draw hand and the owner of this card has a legal hand, boot this card. Cheatin’ Resolution: Attach this card to the cheatin’ player’s home, booted. That player discards one random card from their play hand.
cards.flavor: "You're still with me. That's good." -Sloane, to Mario Crane

cards.title: Mugging
cards.text: Noon Job: Mark an opposing dude. Boot up to two cards attached to the mark. If the job succeeds, send the mark home booted, and you may ace up to two booted cards attached to the mark.

cards.title: Darius Hellstromme
cards.text: If you are the leader, your shooter has -2 bullets if they do not have a Gadget Weapon attached. React, Boot: After an opposing dude is discarded or aced during a shootout, boot a Gadget Weapon in your posse to give your dude with a Gadget Weapon a permanent control point. If the opposing dude was discarded, they are aced instead.

cards.title: Ezekiah Grimme
cards.text: When attaching a spell to a card, increase the spell's ghost rock cost by the number of copies of that spell in play. React, Boot: After your dude successfully casts a spell attached to them, if the pull was a spell, you may attach it to that dude, booted (paying all costs). Noon, Boot: Boot your skilled dude to reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. If you revealed a spell you have less than 2 copies of in play, you may attach it to that dude (paying all costs). Shuffle the remaining revealed cards into your deck.

cards.title: Jasper Stone
cards.text: Except at home, only your shooter contributes to your draw hand bonuses. React, Boot: After posses are formed, choose a dude in the opposing posse. Your shooter has +2 bullets while opposing that dude, and while your posse has a non-token dude. If that opposing dude is aced, give your declared shooter a permanent control point and permanent +1 bullets.

cards.title: Raven
cards.text: If you are the leader, your posse has a -2 stud pentalty if it has less bullets than the opposing posse. You have an extra control point during Sundown if you control equal or more in-town deeds that you do not own compared to each other player. Noon, Boot: Choose an in-town deed. Your shooter has +2 bullets during shootouts there. The next time you win a shootout there, or if you control it during Sundown and do not own it, give your dude there a permanent +1 bullets if they do not already have a permanent bullet bonus.

cards.title: Hellstromme Plant #9
cards.text: Controller Noon/Shootout, Pay 1 Ghost Rock, Boot: Choose a dude you own and control. Unboot a Horse or Gadget attached to that dude. You can use one of the abilities on that Horse or Gadget another time this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Brew Unto Others"
Yards Brewing, PAX Unplugged 2017

cards.title: Sunday Best
cards.text: This dude has +3 Influence during the Upkeep phase. React, Boot: At the start of the Upkeep Phase, move this dude to an adjacent location (without booting).
cards.flavor: "Be merciful unto me, oh God, be merciful..."

cards.title: Willa Mae MacGowan
cards.text: Resolution: Ace Willa to send all other dudes in your posse home booted.
cards.flavor: "The children here need protection from the terrors too, Lucy. And I'll always have their backs, come hell or high water."

cards.title: General Store
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Attach a goods or spell (as shoppin'), reducing the cost of that card by 2 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Mr. Earp, I will testify those are Frank Sitwell's boots, but you tie him to that stagecoach robbery, you're gonna have more trouble from them cowboys."

cards.title: Shotgun
cards.text: Shootout, Boot: Choose and ace an opposing dude in this shootout with a value less than or equal to this dude's bullets.
cards.flavor: Sometimes natural selection does the job just as well as good marksmanship.

cards.title: Joker
cards.flavor: "Our ringmaster in Gomorra helped me when I had these problems, Curly Bill. This Stone fellow reminds me of him. If you truly seek Death, he's your answer."

cards.title: Morgan Cattle Co.
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Boot your dude to play a deed, reducing that deed's cost by that dude's influence, and move that dude to that deed.

cards.title: Jael's Guile
cards.text: Cheatin’ Resolution, Boot: If your hand is illegal, you must boot this dude to use this ability. Your opponent boots or discards a dude in their posse, then boots or discards a dude in their posse. Non-wanted dudes cannot be chosen if there are wanted dudes that can be chosen.

cards.title: No Turning Back
cards.text: Noon: Ace a dude you own and control to gain ghost rock equal to their cost. Resolution: Ace a dude you own and control to reduce your casualties this round to zero. Choose a dude who gets +2 bullets and becomes a stud for the remainder of the Shootout. Your dudes cannot flee this round.
cards.flavor: "I knew it was a fight for life." - Wyatt Earp

cards.title: The Ghostly Gun
cards.text: Resolution: Put The Ghostly Gun into your draw hand; he becomes the suit and value of your choice. Discard a card from your draw hand.
cards.flavor: "He is a man of few words, but his guns speak volumes." - Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Hired Guns
cards.text: Noon: Place a dude from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavor: Their aim don't matter if there's enough of 'em.

cards.title: Hired Help
cards.text: Shootout: A 2-stud Gunslinger token enters play and joins your posse.
cards.flavor: "Dunno where he came from, but if he can shoot, we can use him." - Lane Healey

cards.title: Willa Mae MacGowan
cards.text: Resolution: Ace Willa to send all other dudes in your posse home booted.
cards.flavor: "The children here need protection from the terrors too, Lucy. And I'll always have their backs, come hell or high water."

cards.title: Smiling Tom
cards.text: Tom can only move to your home or to a location that has another Fourth Ring dude.
cards.flavor: "Thomas has gone off wandering again!" - Kevin Wainwright

cards.title: Nicodemus Whateley
cards.text: While your dudes are at in-town deeds, they gain the ability: "Noon, Boot: If this dude has 1 or more influence, give Nicodemus a control point." At the end of Sundown, or if he is ever at home, Nicodemus loses all his control points.

cards.title: Pat's Perch
cards.flavor: "No one is sure who Pat is, but there seems to be activity out there." - Dave Montreal

cards.title: Fetch
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution Hex 5, Boot: You may place a card from your draw hand into your play hand after resolution. If this is a shootout, you suffer 3 less casualties this round.
cards.flavor: I've always wanted one of these!

cards.title: ...It's who you know
cards.text: Noon: One of your dudes calls out an opposing dude at their location. All dudes in both posses use their influence rather than their bullet rating for the shootout (but keep their bullet type). Your dude becomes a stud for this shootout.

cards.title: Forced Quarantine
cards.text: Discard this dude at the end of the turn. Noon Job, Boot: Mark an opposing dude whose current influence, bullets, or value are lower than their printed values. If successful, boot the mark, attach this card to them, and your leader gets one permanent control point.
